citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:08 am on
06/04/2025. Inspection personnel contacted the licensee by phone at 9:08 am; however, the licensee could not provide a
responsible facility representative to accompany the inspectors within 60 minutes of the phone conversation. Failure to
provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure
to comply may result in enforcement action.
Additional Inspectors:
KEVIN WILKEN, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:08 am on 
06/04/2025. Inspection personnel contacted the licensee by phone at 9:08 am; however, the licensee could not provide a 
responsible facility representative to accompany the inspectors within 60 minutes of the phone conversation. Failure to 
provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure 
to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KEVIN WILKEN, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOREnd Section
